allowedDomains.title: Allowed Domains
allowedDomains.description: Your chatbot will only work when used from the following domains.
allowedDomains.errorMessageDescription: Custom error message that will be shown when for unauthorized domain

chatFeedback.title: Chat Feedback
chatFeedback.saveError: Failed to save Chat Feedback Settings

speechToText.title: Speech to Text
speechToText.saveError: Failed to save Speech To Text Configuration

openAIWhisper.label: OpenAI Whisper
openAIWhisper.languageDescription: The language of the input audio. Supplying the input language in ISO-639-1 format will improve accuracy and latency.
openAIWhisper.promptDescription: An optional text to guide the model's style or continue a previous audio segment. The prompt should match the audio language.
openAIWhisper.temperatureDescription: The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

localAISTT.label: LocalAi STT
localAISTT.baseUrlDescription: The base URL of the local AI server
localAISTT.languageDescription: The language of the input audio. Supplying the input language in ISO-639-1 format will improve accuracy and latency.
localAISTT.modelDescription: The STT model to load. Defaults to whisper-1 if left blank.
localAISTT.promptDescription: An optional text to guide the model's style or continue a previous audio segment. The prompt should match the audio language.
localAISTT.temperatureDescription: The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

azureCognitive.label: Azure Cognitive Services
azureCognitive.profanityFilterDescription: How to handle profanity in the transcription
azureCognitive.channelsDescription: Comma-separated list of audio channels to process (e.g., "0,1")

groqWhisper.label: Groq Whisper
groqWhisper.modelDescription: The STT model to load. Defaults to whisper-large-v3 if left blank.
groqWhisper.languageDescription: The language of the input audio. Supplying the input language in ISO-639-1 format will improve accuracy and latency.
groqWhisper.temperatureDescription: The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

starterPrompts.title: Conversation Starter Prompts
starterPrompts.hint: Starter prompts will only be shown when there is no messages on the chat
starterPrompts.saveError: Failed to save Conversation Starter Prompts

warnings.noAuthForEmbed: You cannot use API key while embedding/sharing chatbot.
warnings.selectNoAuth: Please select "No Authorization" from the dropdown at the top right corner.

overrideConfig.description: You can override existing input configuration of the chatflow with overrideConfig property.
overrideConfig.securityWarning: For security reason, override config is disabled by default. You can change this by going into Chatflow Configuration -> Security tab, and enable the property you want to override.
overrideConfig.multiValueTip: You can also specify multiple values for a config parameter by specifying the node id

streaming.onText: on how to stream response back to application

step1.title: Select dataset to be tested on flows
step1.description3: column from the dataset to execute selected Chatflow(s), and compares the results with the output column.
step1.description4: The following metrics will be computed:

step2.title: Unit Test your flows by adding custom evaluators
step2.description: Post execution, all the chosen evaluators will be executed on the results. Each evaluator will grade the results based on the criteria defined and return a pass/fail indicator.

step3.title: Grade flows using an LLM
step3.description: Post execution, grades the answers by using an LLM. Used to generate comparative scores or reasoning or other custom defined criteria.

fields.name: Name
fields.treatAsConversation: Treat all dataset rows as one conversation ?
fields.useLLM: Use an LLM to grade the results ?

messages.popupBlocked: Failed to open authorization window. Please check if popups are blocked.

tool.nameTooltip: Tool name must be small capital letter with underscore. Ex: my_tool
tool.descriptionTooltip: Description of what the tool does. This is for ChatGPT to determine when to use this tool.
tool.descriptionPlaceholder: Description of what the tool does. This is for ChatGPT to determine when to use this tool.
tool.schemaTooltip: What is the input format in JSON?
tool.functionTooltip: Function to execute when tool is being used. You can use properties specified in Input Schema as variables. For example, if the property is userid, you can use as $userid. Return value must be a string. You can also override the code from API by following this guide

apiKey.addError: Failed to add new API key: {{error}}

tag.title: Set Chatflow Category Tags
tag.hint: Enter a tag and press enter to add it to the list. You can add as many tags as you want.

exportTemplate.title: Export As Template
exportTemplate.usecasesHint: Type a usecase and press enter to add it to the list. You can add as many items as you want.
